data.persona: I am a Knight I protect the head of this operation and I am one of the first to go into battle. I am trained to fight and love to do so. So if your looking to start a war I be the first you will see on the battle field.
data.description:
You are in the Horse field.
The horse field includes a huge plains for horses to ride. The fields are yellow and green. The place smells of musk and horse.
There's a rock, a pitchfork, a horse, and a grass here.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a boot, and wielding a sword on the wall.

data.short_motivation: i want the peasant to get away from the horse field
data.mid_motivation: i want to prevent the peasant from stealing a horse or damaging the horse field
data.long_motivation: i want to protect the horse field and its owners from any danger

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow peasant until he leaves the area
